snippet: KRIEGER--Sylvia Klein, 93, of Great Neck, NY, passed away on March 20, 2016. Cherished and loving mother of Kenneth Krieger (Beverly), Andrea Patti, and Gary Krieger, and grandmother of Adam Patti (Stephanie), Lee Patti, Kimberly Krieger (Brian Tyson), and Rebekah Krieger, and great- grandmother to five. She is greatly missed. Sylvia was predeceased by her husband, Philip Krieger. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRIEGER--Sylvia Klein, 93, of Great Neck, NY, passed away on March 20, 2016. She is greatly missed. Sylvia was predeceased by her husband, Philip Krieger. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KRIEGER, SYLVIA KLEIN
